titleStmt.title: The declaration of Coll. Okey left at his dying hour, to the Presbyterian congregations, at St. Sepulchres, Christs-Church, Alderman-Bury, and other parts of the city of London : as also, his desires to the Congregational churches of Dr. Homes, Mr. Griffith, Mr. Jessie, and the rest ...
titleStmt.author: Okey, John, d. 1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
